scripts.dev: concurrently --names api,worker,web --prefix-colors blue,green,magenta --kill-others-on-fail "pnpm -s dev:api" "pnpm -s dev:worker" "pnpm -s dev:web"
scripts.dev:web: wait-on --httpTimeout 60000 http-get://localhost:${CHRISEON_API_PORT:-8090}/v1/info && rm -rf apps/web/.next/dev/lock && pnpm -C apps/web exec next dev -p ${CHRISEON_WEB_PORT:-3000}
